languages.text: Данный паттерн орудий разработан в секторе Каликсис и превосходит по мощи более скромные "Звездоломы", являющиеся его несовершенными копиями и производимые на малых индустриальных мирах. Лишь поистине просвещенные ремесленники способны воспроизвести столь почтенное оружие.

This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.
languages.original_text: Данный паттерн орудий разработан в секторе Каликсис и превосходит по мощи более скромные "Звездоломы", являющиеся его несовершенными копиями и производимые на малых индустриальных мирах. Лишь поистине просвещенные ремесленники способны воспроизвести столь почтенное оружие.

traits.locale_text: This weapon pattern was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the humbler Voidsunders, which were designed as its imperfect copies and are manufactured on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened craftsmen can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

This weapon pattern was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the humbler Voidsunders, which were designed as its imperfect copies and are manufactured on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened craftsmen can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Voidsunderers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened craftsmen can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Voidsunderers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened craftsmen can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

languages.text: Esta arma fue diseñada en el sector Calixis y su potencia de fuego es muy superior al de las humildes Rompeestrellas, que fueron designadas copias imperfectas y solo se producen en mundos industriales secundarios. Solo un artesano verdaderamente iluminado puede crear un arma tan exaltada.
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma fue diseñada en el sector Calixis y su potencia de fuego es muy superior al de las humildes Rompeestrellas, que fueron designadas copias imperfectas y solo se producen en mundos industriales secundarios. Solo un artesano verdaderamente iluminado puede crear un arma tan exaltada.

languages.text: Cette arme mise au point dans le secteur Calixis possède une puissance de feu bien supérieure à celle des plus modestes Brise-Étoiles, qui se trouvent être des copies imparfaites fabriquées sur des mondes industriels mineurs. Seuls les artisans les plus éclairés sont en mesure de reproduire une arme d'une telle grandeur.
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme mise au point dans le secteur Calixis possède une puissance de feu bien supérieure à celle des plus modestes Brise-Étoiles, qui se trouvent être des copies imparfaites fabriquées sur des mondes industriels mineurs. Seuls les artisans les plus éclairés sont en mesure de reproduire une arme d'une telle grandeur.

languages.text: 这种武器源自卡利西斯星区，它的火力远远超出只有小型工业世界才会生产的简陋赝品“碎星者”。唯有见多识广的大工匠师，才能制造出如此精妙的武器。
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

traits.locale_text: 这种武器源自卡利西斯星区，它的火力远远超出只有小型工业世界才会生产的简陋赝品“碎星者”。唯有见多识广的大工匠师，才能制造出如此精妙的武器。

languages.text: この兵器の設計はキャリクシス星域で開発された。不完全なコピーとして設計され、小規模な産業惑星でしか製造されていない、スターブレイカーよりもはるかに優れた火力を誇っている。このような高貴な武器を再現できるのは、真なる啓示を得た職人のみである。
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

traits.locale_text: この兵器の設計はキャリクシス星域で開発された。不完全なコピーとして設計され、小規模な産業惑星でしか製造されていない、スターブレイカーよりもはるかに優れた火力を誇っている。このような高貴な武器を再現できるのは、真なる啓示を得た職人のみである。

languages.text: Diese Waffe wurde im Calixis-Sektor entwickelt. Ihre Feuerkraft ist dem bescheideneren Sternbrecher deutlich überlegen, der als minderwertige Kopie entwickelt wurde und nur auf unbedeutenden Produktionswelten hergestellt wird. Nur wirklich erleuchtete Artifexe können eine solch erhabene Waffe reproduzieren.
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe wurde im Calixis-Sektor entwickelt. Ihre Feuerkraft ist dem bescheideneren Starbreaker deutlich überlegen, der als minderwertige Kopie entwickelt wurde und nur auf unbedeutenden Produktionswelten hergestellt wird. Nur wirklich erleuchtete Artifexe können eine solch erhabene Waffe reproduzieren.

languages.text: Bu silah tasarımı, Calixis Sektörü'nde geliştirilmiştir. Kusurlu kopyalar olarak tasarlanan ve yalnızca küçük sınai dünyalarda imal edilen daha mütevazı Yıldız Kıranlara kıyasla çok daha üstün ateş gücüne sahiptirler. Yalnızca gerçek manada aydınlanmış zanaatkârlar böylesine yüce bir silahı üretebilecek kapasitededir.
languages.original_text: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.
